content:
Ukrainian copyists engaged in equipment on the march and parking lot, in communication and in the enemy's armor.

Appropriate videoHe outlined March 8Commander of the Land Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Lieutenant General Alexander Pavlyuk.

According to him, the video was worked by the Asgard Group "Eyes" 120 ORP together with the 24th separate mechanized brigade, the chief of the RBS service and the crew of Shark 28 of a separate mechanized brigade, for cooperation with the 101st separate brigade .

Earlier Alexander PavlyukpromisedCounter -man from the Armed Forces.
title: Tank, guns, Zenit: Defense forces showed a movie about the destruction of enemy technique with drones
description: The corresponding video was posted on March 8 by the commander of the Land Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine ...
